value.name: Woman shot, killed by Gardner police in a disturbance call
value.description: Gardner police fatally shot 53-year-old Deanne Choate late Thursday after officers responded to a reported disturbance. Kurt Strazdins KRT Gardner police shot and killed a woman Thursday night ...
